sourcesContent:
// src/components/HomeScreen.js import React from 'react'; import { User, Calendar, Gift, LogOut, Grid, Trophy, Target, Flame } from 'lucide-react'; const HomeScreen = ({ user, logout, drawDailyImage, loading, todaysClaim, userCollection, getStreakCount, imageDatabase, setCurrentView, }) => (
{/* Enhanced Mobile-Friendly Header */}

POCKET MACHICOULIS

🏰

Ton aventure continue !

⚔️
{/* Enhanced Mobile-Friendly Main Card */}
{/* User Header - Mobile Optimized */}

Salut, {user.username}! 🎮 {user.username === 'admin' && 👑 ADMIN}

Collection: {userCollection.length} images ✨

Série: {getStreakCount()} jours 🔥

{imageDatabase.length} images disponibles 🎯

{/* Quick Stats Bar - Mobile Friendly */}
{userCollection.length}

Images

{getStreakCount()}

Série

{Math.round((userCollection.length / imageDatabase.length) * 100)}%

Complet

{userCollection.length > 0 ? userCollection.reduce((prev, curr) => { const rarityOrder = { Common: 1, Rare: 2, Epic: 3, Legendary: 4 }; return rarityOrder[curr.rarity] > rarityOrder[prev.rarity] ? curr : prev; }).rarity?.slice(0, 4) || 'None' : 'None' } ✨

Rare

{/* Main Action Cards - Stacked on Mobile */}
{/* Daily Draw Card */}

Tirage Quotidien 🎲

{!todaysClaim ? (

{user.username === 'admin' ? 'Prêt pour un nouveau tirage ? (Mode Admin) 👑' : 'Prêt à découvrir l\'image du jour ? 🎁'}

) : (

Tu as déjà récupéré l'image d'aujourd'hui ! 🎉

Reviens demain pour une nouvelle image !
)}
{/* Collection Card */}

Ta Collection 📚

Images totales: {userCollection.length} 🎯
Série quotidienne: {getStreakCount()} 🔥
Plus rare: {userCollection.length > 0 ? userCollection.reduce((prev, curr) => { const rarityOrder = { Common: 1, Rare: 2, Epic: 3, Legendary: 4 }; return rarityOrder[curr.rarity] > rarityOrder[prev.rarity] ? curr : prev; }).rarity : 'Aucune' } ✨
Complétion: {Math.round((userCollection.length / imageDatabase.length) * 100)}% 🎊
{/* Floating Elements - Reduced on Mobile */}
🛡️
✨
🗡️
🏹
{/* Mobile-only simplified floating elements */}
✨
🗡️
); export default HomeScreen;
